title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

title: vulnhub
content: 开始靶机学习，此处记录参考学习资料以及遇到的坑。 Billu_b0xkali linux工具集下载1$ https://www.kali.org/downloads/ 参考文档，以作者思路渗透1$ https://www.freebuf.com/sectool/170713.html 菜刀，参考文档有用到1$ https://github.com/easy4sec/caidao-20160620-www.maicaidao.com 总结123$ 一路下来比较顺利，图片上传那卡了下，windows+kali结合更快些$ 扫描目录使用dirbuster，没有扫出来phpmy目录，比较遗憾$ kali上没有菜刀，但是有webacoo，据说很强，需要学习下 FristiLeaks v1.3参考文档，以作者思路渗透1https://www.freebuf.com/column/162403.html 网卡不能正常获取IP地址1https://www.tinymind.net.cn/news/c1fcdb19113288 Toppo参考文档，以作者思路渗透1https://www.freebuf.com/column/234171.html VMware通过vmdk文件创建虚拟机1https://jingyan.baidu.com/article/9113f81b2796852b3214c705.html find通过权限查找1https://www.cnblogs.com/brian-linux/p/10774406.html Os-ByteSec参考文档，以作者思路渗透1https://www.freebuf.com/articles/system/221949.html

title: vulnhub2
